getKeyspace: SELECT keyspace_name FROM system.schema_keyspaces WHERE keyspace_name='<keyspace_name>';
getColumnFamily: SELECT columnfamily_name FROM system.schema_columnfamilies WHERE keyspace_name='<keyspace_name>' and columnfamily_name = 'sys_migrations';
createMigrationTable: CREATE TABLE <keyspace_name>.sys_migrations(file_path TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, name TEXT, description TEXT, PRIMARY KEY (file_path, created_at));
insertMigration: INSERT INTO <keyspace_name>.sys_migrations(file_path, created_at, name, description) values('<file_path>', <created_at>, '<name>', '<description>');
